Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect match for your needs, considering its worth of $1200000 to you. I am offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $950000. This offer represents a substantial saving compared to its intrinsic value and provides you with an excellent opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details with you further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
